text: The women's 4x400 metres relay event at the 1992 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Seoul, Korea, at Olympic Stadium on 19 and 20 September. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Georgeta Petrea Mariana Florea Ionela Tîrlea Maria Magdalena Nedelcu ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Debbie-Ann Parris Catherine Scott Ellen Grant Claudine Williams ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Imke Köhler Wiebke Steffen Anita Oppong Silvia Steimle ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 20 September {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
